article_title: Top UN court orders Israel to allow aid into Gaza
sentence: In  its  ruling,  the  ICJ  said  Gaza  was  "no  longer  facing  only  a  risk  of  famine"  but  "famine  is  setting  in"  and  that,  according  to  UN  observers,  31  people,  including  27  children,  had  already  died  of  malnutrition  and  dehydration.

article_title: Top UN court orders Israel to allow aid into Gaza
sentence: The  current  conflict  began  after  the  7  October  attack,  which  saw  Hamas-led  gunmen  storm  across  the  border  into  Israel,  killing  around  1,200  people  and  taking  more  than  250  others  hostage.

article_title: Top UN court orders Israel to allow aid into Gaza
sentence: Of  those  taken,  about  130  remain  unaccounted  for,  at  least  34  of  whom  are  presumed  dead.

article_title: Top UN court orders Israel to allow aid into Gaza
sentence: Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  Israel's  retaliatory  campaign  has  killed  at  least  32,623  people.

article_title: Top UN court orders Israel to allow aid into Gaza
sentence: Earlier  this  month,  US  Defence  Secretary  Lloyd  Austin  said  that,  of  those  killed,  more  than  25,000  were  women  and  children.
